General.Name: Edesa Holding SA
General.Description: EDESA Holding S.A., through its subsidiaries, engages in the generation, distribution, and marketing of electricity. The company was incorporated in 2012 and is headquartered in Buenos Aires, Argentina. EDESA Holding S.A. is a subsidiary of Salta Inversiones Eléctricas S.A.
General.Address: Ortiz de Ocampo 3302, Buenos Aires, Argentina, 1425
